Extended Description: 230V AC Primary Step-Down Transformer: High galvanic isolation with low electromagnetic interference (EMI) profile for grid safety.
Full-Wave Bridge Rectifier: High-current capacity stage designed for efficient AC to DC energy conversion with minimal voltage drop.
Bulk Filtration: 6800uF 25V Low-ESR (Equivalent Series Resistance) Aluminum Electrolytic Capacitor for maximum ripple voltage suppression.
Transient Decoupling: Metallized Polyester (PET) Film Capacitors for high-frequency noise filtering and input/output stability.
Precision Smoothing: High-stability Conductive Polymer Aluminum Solid Capacitor for low-noise output rail regulation.
Status Indicator: High-efficiency Red LED (660 nm) for real-time power-on diagnostic and visual verification.
Primary Overcurrent Protection: 250mA Slow-Blow (Time-Delay) subminiature fuse for AC grid surge protection.
Secondary Rail Protection: 2.5A Fast-Acting subminiature radial leaded fuse for load-side short-circuit mitigation.
High-Efficiency Switching Regulator: Traco Power non-isolated step-down converter with up to 95% peak efficiency for thermal management.
Precision Current Limiting: 1k Ohm High-Precision metal film resistor with 1% tolerance for optimized LED longevity and stability.
Heavy-Duty Power Interface: 5.08mm pitch screw terminal blocks for secure and robust field wire connections.
